div.p: Do you think it is more important to have an enjoyable job or to make money? Explain your point of view.

In my opinion, to be happy in your job is really more important than to make money. Indeed, money alone doesn't make you happy. Money is of course also important in order to have a good balance in the life and in the job, but it is not enough.

Beside this, studies showed that a good motivation in the job depends more on the goals or on the atmosphere with the colleagues and the hierarchy than on the salary. As a matter of fact, salary is just a part of motivation. In case of salary's increase, you 're happy at the beginning, but this feeling of happyness because of the augmentation won't stay after a few weeks or months, you will be used to this.
